text: Hashmatullah Shahidi (Pashto: حشمت الله شاهدي; born 4 November 1994) is an Afghan cricketer and currently the captain of Afghanistan national cricket team in One Day International(ODI) and Test cricket. He became the first Afghan player to score a double hundred in Test cricket. He idolises the Sri Lankan great, Kumar Sangakkara. ==References== ==Other websites== * Hashmatullah Shahidi from Cricbuzz Category:Afghan cricketers Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:21st-century Afghan people
title: Hashmatullah Shahidi
